QuestData.Title: Resupplying One Keg
QuestData.Description: If you're looking for the best supplies in Kun-Lai you've come to the right place! Oh sure, it looks a bit empty. Don't let appearances deceive you..$b$bOh, who am I kidding?! Between the hozen attacks, and the sprites pillaging what few supplies we do get, my stock has dwindled to a dangerous level.$b$bIf you could help me recover some of my supplies I should have enough to contribute to your journey.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 8 Stolen Supplies from Howlingwind Cavern.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you manage to get some of my supplies back?
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you, $n! If I just cut off the nibbled pieces and repair the minor damage, I may still be able to sell these.$b$bOnce your cart is ready to go I'll have the supplies I promised loaded up!
